name: Graydle Hive-Mind
text:
1 "Graydle" monster
When this card is Link Summoned, destroy 1 card on the field; add 1 "Graydle" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If you control "Graydle Dragon" you can activate this effect: Once per turn (Quick Effect): target 1 monster on your opponent’s side of the field; take control of that target until the end of the turn. This card’s ATK is 3000 if you control an opponent’s monster. You can only Special Summon one "Graydle Hive-Mind" per turn.
